title: The Top 21 Inventions Of 2021
cleaned_text:
Thousands of inventions were created in 2021, some genius, some mediocre. But the many that wowed us managed to make the list. So here’s the rundown of the top 21 inventions in honor of 2021.

Keep Your Head Up

The Speaker That Reads The Room

Syng Cell Alpha’s speaker uses tones and microphones to calibrate itself to the shape and acoustics of the room.

Out with the old selfie sticks and in with the new, Vecnos introduced a short, slim, yet innovative alternative with 360º cameras at its tip.

Many trials were in the works in 2020, but the implementation of vaccines from mainly Pfizer and Moderna has undoubtedly saved thousands from the dreaded virus.

For the mothers who don’t want to pump in public, Elvie Stride’s Breast Pump helps you do so in a hidden way.

Pro Power Onboard offers a new level of convenience by transferring energy from a running engine or battery pack (F-150 Hybrid) to an arrangement of outlets in the truck.

Eno Skylite’s Hammock has a mesh closing to let you sleep in the great outdoors while keeping bugs out and views in sight.

Looking Glass’ 3D Portrait allows you to get a better look at the photo on your desk.
